translations: 胳肢；使发痒；使高兴，使满足（tickle 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: I was tickled to discover that we'd both done the same thing.
sentences.translation: 我高兴地发现我俩在做同样的事。

sentences.sentence: Her lips were close to his head and her breath tickled his ear.
sentences.translation: 她的嘴唇靠近他的头，她的气息轻挠他的耳朵。

sentences.sentence: Amber was tickled pink to have the chance to play with the Wii and said, "Sounds great!"
sentences.translation: 安布尔很高兴能有机会玩 Wii 游戏机，她说：“听起来太棒了！”
